meanings.sent1: The vealiest dish at the restaurant was the most delicious.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared the vealiest veal cutlet I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The vealiest meal on the menu made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were so vealiest, she could make any dish taste amazing.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the vealiest stew filled the entire kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The vealiest calf in the herd had the softest fur.
meanings.sent2: The butcher selected the vealiest meat for the special dish.
meanings.sent3: The vealiest cow in the field looked content grazing on the grass.
meanings.sent4: The vealiest texture of the fabric reminded her of a baby calf's skin.
meanings.sent5: The vealiest scent of the dish brought back memories of the farm.
